@_tm5k In addition, if it's financial info you're after, Monero offers WAY WAY more flexibility. You can cryptographically prove the details of a transaction either publicly, or to select third-party, or to a group of third-parties. Is that not desirable to banks & politicians alike?

@_tm5k You can do that with Monero right now. You can pack entirely unencrypted data into the tx_extra field if you want. In fact, payment IDs in Monero are available in both unencrypted and encrypted form.
